      • addEvents

        protected abstract void addEvents()
        Subclasses should register events here

      • addEvent

        protected final Event addEvent(java.lang.String eventName,
                               MethodInfo targetMethod,
                               InjectionPoint injectionPoint)
        Register a new event to be injected, the event instance will be created if it does not already exist.
        Parameters:
        eventName - Name of the event to use/create. Beware that IllegalArgumentException if the event was already defined with incompatible parameters
        targetMethod - Method descriptor to identify the method to inject into
        injectionPoint - Delegate which finds the location(s) in the target method to inject into
        Returns:
        the event - for fluent interface

      • addEvent

        protected final Event addEvent(Event event,
                               MethodInfo targetMethod,
                               InjectionPoint injectionPoint)
        Register an event to be injected
        Parameters:
        event - Event to inject
        targetMethod - Method descriptor to identify the method to inject into
        injectionPoint - Delegate which finds the location(s) in the target method to inject into
        Returns:
        the event - for fluent interface
